extendedInfo.description: Give remembrance to Caylee, the little girl whose tragic passing came too soon.This free app was created in memory of Caylee Anthony. Her mysterious, tragic death in 2008, along with the trial that followed, captured the attention of the world. On July 5, 2011 her mother, Casey Anthony, was found not guilty on all murder, manslaughter and child abuse charges in Orlando, FL.Designed as a virtual memorial for Caylee, this new version of the app allows you to select one of nine beautiful flowers as a tribute, then place your flower wherever you choose in a stunning 3D landscape with moving clouds. After you have placed your flower, continue using the app to view the memorial, and watch the field filling with more and more flowers for Caylee as others visit. The peaceful music of Erik Satie's "Gymnopedies" plays while you view the memorial garden.*We acknowledge there may be a few bugs in this updated version (2.0). We plan on adding additional error handling and sharing abilities for July 17th release. PLEASE E-MAIL ALL FEATURE REQUESTS AND BUG REPORTS to eric.vause@gmail.com*If you would like to place additional flowers and make an optional donation to the developers to support them in creating and maintaining this memorial app, you can download the separate donate version, 'Flowers for Caylee (donate)'.Please download and share this app, 'Flowers for Caylee', with everyone who was touched by her passing. Thank you for your support.Rest in Peace, Caylee.(c) 2011 TVCProgramming by Eric Vause and Captain Ned Blakely.Graphics support by Christina M.

reviews.title: *REST N HEAVEN *CAYLEE
reviews.comment: Nice app... would of gave it 5 stars if u could really place the flower where u wanted it. Other than that its OK.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Watched a hundred times,
reviews.comment: And I cried more and more each time. All the proof needed  was there and casey still walked away uncharged. This is the part that enrages me! That\'s our jury for ya, even with the proof of crime involved you still walk free. And our country wonders why there are so many murders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is so cute! I love it so much! If only Caylee knew the love America is giving her! RIP babygirl 2005~2008 </3

reviews.title: Poor baby...
reviews.comment: Such a sweet little girl. She didn\'t deserve to die so young. She must have been so scared... though she isn\'t the only child to die.. it is still so sad.. what would she have been as an adult? What were her dreams? To be a princess? You sure are little baby. I placed a flower. I will not forget you. Rest in piece sweet heart...
